name: Chaos Flight Crew
description:
I developed this game during the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2.

The theme of the Jam was "Let there be Chaos!"

Due to a huge bug that made the game unplayable in the Browser, i wasn't able to upload the game before the Jam Deadline, even tho i finished the game in time...

Anyways, im very happy it finally works now, and people can play it! ^^

Please enjoy! :)
